text: Antero Leitzinger (born 1962) is political historian and researcher for the Finnish Directorate of Immigration.Global Politician, 2 February 2005. He is the author of “Caucasus—An Unholy Alliance.” He is a history researcher on topics from Russia to Islam. Leitzinger was born in Helsinki, Finland. The majority of his works are in Finnish. == Bibliography == ===In English=== *Caucasus and an Unholy Alliance, Leitzinger Books, 1997, *Kurdistan, Directorate of Immigration, 1999, == References == == External links == *The Circassian Genocide Category:Finnish historians Category:Finnish people of Swiss descent Category:Living people Category:1962 births
title: Antero Leitzinger
